title: #802 - Rudy Sarzo
description:
Rudy Sarzo, a  legendary Bass player who has played with, Ozzy Osbourne, Whitesnake, and Dio to name a few, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt LIVE via Zoom.

This podcast is brought to you by:

Onnit.com. Use Promo code CHURCH for a 10% discount at checkout.
